dmca.title: Rolex wants spam removed from list archives
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Gilmore,

     This firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. ("Rolex"),
the owners of the exclusive right to use the federally-registered 
trademarks, including but not limited to, ROLEX, PRESIDENT, SUBMARINER,
YACHT-MASTER, DAYTONA, GMT-MASTER, DATEJUST and Crown Device 
(hereinafter collectively referred to as the "Rolex Trademarks").

     It has come to Rolex's attention that your company is the Bulletin
Board operator for http://lists.freeswan.org.  Your Web Page enables the 
following vendors to advertise and conduct sales of counterfeit and
infringing Rolex watches bearing the Rolex Trademarks:

  Vendor                          Exact Location of Counterfeit Rolex
                                  Watch Posting on         
                                  http://lists.freeswan.org Web Site/
                                  Bulletin Board

 Swisswatchfactoryoutlet_101_@cs.com
    http://lists.freeswan.org/pipermail/design/2003-March/004535.html

     Such use is likely to cause confusion and constitutes
counterfeiting, trademark infringement and dilution of Rolex's
intellectual property rights in violation of both federal and
state laws.

     We are writing to notify you that, as the service provider/
bulletin board operator for http://lists.freeswan.org.  You may
be held liable for trademark counterfeiting and infringement.
The penalties for such conduct are severe and may include injunctive
relief, actual damages, statutory damages of up to $1,000,000 for
each trademark that has been counterfeited, costs and attorneys' fees.

     In order to avoid further legal proceedings, we must receive your 
written reassurances by October 14, 2004 (underlined) that your 
company will immediately remove all postings on your Bulletin Board
relating to the unlawful use of the Rolex Trademarks.

     We await an immediate response from you or your counsel.

                     Sincerely,
                     Gibney, Anthony & Flaherty, LLP

                     By: ____(signature)_________
                     [Private]
